description: MCP configuration for Shopify webhook management via ChatGPT

setup: 1. Replace 'your-store.myshopify.com' with your actual Shopify store domain
2. Replace 'your-admin-api-access-token' with your actual Admin API access token
3. Ensure your Shopify app has the required scopes: read_webhooks, write_webhooks
5. Add this configuration to your AI assistant's MCP settings
usage: - 'Create a webhook for order creation events'
- 'Set up a Pub/Sub webhook for product updates'
